tool_description: Validates academic document structure against standard formats, checking section order, hierarchy, and completeness.

document_type.description: Type of academic document: journal_article, thesis, dissertation, conference_paper, or book_chapter

error_messages: Empty sections list: Provide at least one document section.
Unknown document type: Use one of [journal_article, thesis, dissertation, conference_paper, book_chapter].
Too many sections: Maximum 50 sections allowed.
Invalid section names: One or more section names are not recognized.
Conflicting parameters: Custom required_sections conflicts with document_type requirements.
usage: Provide document_sections array and document_type. Optionally specify discipline, enable check_subsections, or provide custom required_sections.

structure_valid.description: Whether the document structure is valid

unexpected_sections.description: Sections that are not typically expected

section_order_issues.description: Sections that appear in wrong order
